headline: Singapore Set to Hold Policy as Economy Shows Tariff Resilience
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Singapore’s central bank will likely leave its monetary policy unchanged for the first time this year, adopting a wait-and-see approach as policymakers gauge looming US tariffs that risk weighing on growth. headline: Bank of America appoints new tech chief as Bhasin retires, memo shows
summary: NEW YORK (Reuters) -Bank of America's chief technology and information officer, Aditya Bhasin, is retiring from the lender and will be replaced by Hari Gopalkrishnan, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters on Monday.  Bhasin, whose career spans more than two decades at BofA, will take on a new role outside the bank advising and investing in mid-sized companies.  The incoming tech chief, Gopalkrishnan, joined BofA in 2011 after holding senior technology roles at Citigroup.

Bhasin, whose career spans more than two decades at BofA, will take on a new role outside the bank advising and investing in mid-sized companies.  The incoming tech chief, Gopalkrishnan, joined BofA in 2011 after holding senior technology roles at Citigroup.

headline: After Taking A 40% Pay Cut, She Regretted Her Career Pivot— Until It Landed Her A Job At Meta
summary: When Dawn Choo was in college, she landed an internship at Facebook. The experience was so positive that she applied for full-time positions with Meta (NASDAQ:META) post-graduation, hoping to become a data scientist at Instagram. Unfortunately, she didn't get an offer. Eventually, she landed a finance role at Bank of America (NYSE:BAC). While it wasn't the position she'd dreamed of, she accepted it, needing a full-time job in order to remain in the country. A year and a half into her tenure, Cho

headline: Oil Caught Between a $70 Summer and Growing Surplus Fears
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Oil traders are grappling with a tension — there’s a growing chorus of warnings about the market weakening later this year and into 2026, but for now prices are holding strong near $70 a barrel.
